Message:
The power to defy death
should’ve been born from
a heart that doesn’t wish to die,

The moment I thought of asking
her why she wanted to know,
she answered me.

I’m not foolish enough to
believe such empty words.

But, if she’s that curious,
I’ll tell her my story.

Bandits came to my village
and attacked my family.

The fear I felt from seeing it all
happen turned me into a witch.

When one’s family is attacked
before their very eyes,
it’s normal to wanna
save them, right?

Well, I couldn’t even think
about saving my family...

I was so scared...
so frightened...so hopeless.
